projects.name: Development of a Web3 application for realizing a decentralized social network
projects.desc: Spark is a decentralized social network that allows users to create, share and store content through blockchain technologies and IPFS.

projects.name: Real time data application
projects.desc: The topic of this project is building a functional application for real-time data processing, with a focus on collecting environmental data over a long period of time and performing statistical analysis. The system uses Raspberry Pi for data collection and Haskell for processing and analysis.

projects.name: SmileWithUs
projects.desc: Development of a web application intended for online ordering of dental appointments
